sentences.en: ...a pledge not to raise taxes on people below a certain income.
sentences.cn: …一个对收入低于一定水平的人不提高税收的承诺。

sentences.en: A farmer is entitled to a certain particularized tax treatment.
sentences.cn: 农民能够得到某种具体的税收待遇。

sentences.en: Accusations of tax evasion have tarnished his clean image.
sentences.cn: 避税的指控使他的清白形象蒙污。

sentences.en: Cigarettes are heavily taxed in Britain.
sentences.cn: 在英国，香烟被课以重税。

sentences.en: He already pays 40% tax on his income.
sentences.cn: 他的收入已经要缴40%的税了。

sentences.en: He announced big tax increases for the next two financial years.
sentences.cn: 他宣布在接下来的两个财年里将大幅提高税收。

sentences.en: He called for an increase of 1p on income tax.
sentences.cn: 他呼吁所得税提高1便士。

sentences.en: His tax-cutting pledge brought a delirious crowd to their feet.
sentences.cn: 他减税的承诺让亢奋的人群欢呼雀跃起来。

sentences.en: In practice a graduate tax is an administrative nightmare.
sentences.cn: 毕业税具体操作起来不啻一场行政噩梦。

sentences.en: Is a tax increase still out of the question?
sentences.cn: 增加税收仍然是不可能的事吗？

sentences.en: It is possible that a tax cut might have some stimulative effect.
sentences.cn: 减税或许会产生某种刺激作用——这是可能的。

sentences.en: Legally, the local tax office is in the right.
sentences.cn: 从法律的角度来说，当地税务局的做法是无可厚非的。

sentences.en: Many struggling firms are ready to break the law by dodging tax.
sentences.cn: 很多挣扎求生的企业不惜违法逃税。

sentences.en: Purchase tax was not payable on goods for export.
sentences.cn: 出口商品不需要交购买税。

sentences.en: Some people accuse the tax inspectors of bully-boy tactics.
sentences.cn: 有些人指控税务稽查员使用了流氓手段。

sentences.en: The group made a pre-tax profit of £11.05 million.
sentences.cn: 该集团的税前利润为1,105万英镑。

sentences.en: The tax increase sounded the death knell for the business.
sentences.cn: 税赋的增加为这个企业敲响了丧钟。

sentences.en: They are calling for large spending cuts and tax increases.
sentences.cn: 他们呼吁大幅度削减开支并提高税收。

words.tran_cn: [税收] 可课税性；可征税性

trans.tran_en: to charge a tax on something

trans.tran_cn: 对…征税； 使负重担， 使费尽力气； 责备， 谴责
